show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #97 Loyd Borntrager "Solving Problems with Food"
subtitle: #97 Loyd Borntrager "Solving Problems with Food"
summary:
My friend Loyd Borntrager joins on Zoom to give me an update on how 2022 went on the dairy, challenges faced, lessons learned and things he and his family are looking forward to in 2023.
